import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import getYouTubeID from 'get-youtube-id'; import YouTube from 'react-youtube'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const Play = () => { const [link, setLink] = useState("2qlij2qkHZc") const id = getYouTubeID("http://www.youtube.com/" + "watch?v=2qlij2qkHZc&list=PLwGdqUZWnOp2nz2T6SfWX9t6D6SYn3XlN&index=2"); const opts = { height: '100%', width: '100%', playerVars: { // https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters autoplay: 0, }, } useEffect(() => { if (!link) { window.alert("Invalid link! try refreshing."); } }, [link]); const watchNow = (e) => { const value = e.target; // const value = "I95RDL7uhjc"; console.log(value); setLink(value); } return (<>
{link && }
